task: Implement a tiny todo app scaffold

plannerResult.raw_task: Implement a tiny todo app scaffold

subtasks.name: agent-scaffold
subtasks.objective: Set up the base project scaffold: folder layout, build/run scripts, main entrypoint, and placeholder configuration files for a minimal runnable app.

subtasks.name: agent-domain
subtasks.objective: Implement the core todo model and state actions (create, toggle complete, remove, list) with clean interfaces that can be consumed by the UI layer.

subtasks.name: agent-ui
subtasks.objective: Build a simple UI scaffold that renders todos and wires add/toggle/delete interactions to the domain layer, with lightweight styling and empty-state handling.

subtasks.name: agent-docs
subtasks.objective: Write concise setup and usage documentation, including run commands, current scaffold capabilities, and clearly marked next-step enhancements.
